Ayssi comensan las paraulas de Albucasim .	Aysse learns the words from Albuquerque.
O, filhs, pus yeu he a vos complit aquest libre, le qual es le derier de la sciencia de medicina, per le compliment de lu so consequit la fi en lu, e per las exposicios de lu, e per las declaracios de lu, es a mi vist que yeu complesca aquel a vos am aquest tractat, le qual es partida de la operacio am ma, so es cyrurgia.	Dear sons, as you have completed this book, which is the last in the science of medicine, for your own benefit and growth, and for my satisfaction at your achievement, I believe it fitting to offer you this treatise, part of the work that has been done by me, on surgery.
Quar la operacio am ma es prostrada en nostre regio e en nostre temps de tot privada, entro que fort leu peric la sciencia de lu, e le vistigi de lu es ostat; e no romasero de lu sino alcunas petitas descripcios en les libres dels Antics, les quals mudero las mas e endevenc ad aquels error e heyssitacio entro que son clausas las entencios de lu e es elonguada la forsa de lu e l’art.	The work has been laid to rest in our realm and during our times, being completely privatized, until it was rediscovered by him; only a few small descriptions of them can be found in the books of the ancients, which changed most and led to those errors and heresies that are closed within themselves the intentions of it and its strength is elongated.
E es vist a mi que yeu vivifique aquela am ordenacio de aquest tractat en aquela segon la via de exposicio e de declaracio e de abreviacio; e per que vengua am las formas dels ferramentz de cautheri e dels autres instrumentz de la obra cum sia per addicio de la declaracio, e per preparacio de lu, la qual causa es necessaria.	I understand that you want to revive this order of the treatise according to the method of exposition and declaration and abbreviation; so it comes in those forms of tools for binding and other instruments of work as is due by virtue of the explanation and also preparation thereof, which cause is necessary.
Mays la causa per la qual no es atrobat bo artifex am la sieua ma en aquest nostre temps, es quar la art de medicina es longua, e que cove le sieu actor denant aquo esser excercitat en la sciencia de anotomia la qual recontec Gualia entro que sapia les juvament dels membres e las formas de aquels, e la conjunctio e la separacio de lor; e haia la conoyssensa dels osses, dels nervis e dels lacertz, e·l nombre de aquels, e la egrecio de lor; e de las venas pulsatils e de las quietas, e dels locs del eyssiment de lor.	The reason why this art is not forgotten today is because the art of medicine has been lengthy and it requires its practitioners to be trained in the science of anatomy, which Gualterus stated he knew how to identify the movements and shapes of the limbs, their connection and separation, as well as having knowledge about bones, nerves, and muscles. He also had names for these body parts and understood their functions; along with understanding pulsating veins and quiet ones, and locations where bodily fluids are expelled from them.
E per aquo ditz Ypocras que am u nom es mot, mays en l’obra petit, e majorment en la art de la ma.	PER AQUO DIZ Ypocras QUE AH MU NOM ES MOT, MAYS EN L'OBRA PITTIT E MAGREMENT EN LA ART DE LA MA.
Mays nos ja avem dit de aquel en l’introit de aquest libre; quar qui no es scient aquo que li avem dit de anotomia, no es evacuat que no caia en error per la qual siran mortz les homes, ayssi cum yeu he vist trops de aquels, quar alscus son formatz en esta sciencia e gettan se de aquela ses sciencia e ses experiment.	In the introduction to this book, we have said that those who are not knowledgeable in anatomy may fall into errors which could lead people to their deaths, as I myself have witnessed too many times; for they claim to be experts in this science and then disregard everything they learned.
Quar yeu vi un metge folh e enperit aver incidit un apostema escrophilos en le colh de una femna, e incidic alcunas arterias del colh per que fluic gran sanc entro que la femna cazec morta entre las mas de lu.	I saw a wise physician and he was about to induce an abscess of the cervix in a woman, causing some vessels of her neck through which great blood flowed that resulted in the woman dying amongst many others.
E vi un autre metge que pres que el traguera una peyra d’un home le qual avia procesit en sa etat, e la peyra era gran, e venguet a lu e trayssec aquela peyra am un tros de la vesiqua, per que aquel home al tertz dia es mort.	A man passed by and noticed another carpenter who was carrying a stone from the burial of a deceased person; the stone was large. He approached and lifted that heavy stone with just one hand, causing it to crack at its base on the third day after which the deceased's body began to decompose.
E yeu ja apelat fuy a estrayre aquela, e vi que per la grandesa de la peyra e per la disposicio del malaute conogui subre lu que morira.	In that year I heard of the stone being extracted, and I knew from its size and the disposition of the illness it would surely cause death.
E vi un autre metge le qual prenia stipendic de un duc de nostra terra per cyrurgia, e endeven a un crastrat negre le qual era deves lu fractura en la coyssa de lu; e perparec le metge am la sua ignorancia, estrayssec la fractura, sobre la plagua, am pulvinas e astelas am forta strectura, e no layssec a la plagua espiracio.	Another surgeon from our land received a stipend of one ducat per surgery and was treating a black crust on the patient's leg which had been caused by a fracture; however, due to his ignorance, the surgeon aggravated the fracture, placing it over a pillow with straps and levers under excessive tension, causing further damage instead of healing.
E aprop le desliet segons los sieus desiriers, e aprop le relieg, e aprop le leyssec per alcus jorns e comandec que nos deslies le liament; e estec ayssi entro que la coyssa e·l pe foro apostematz, e pervenguet a perdicio.	May He grant us guidance according to our desires, and may we adhere faithfully to His laws, and walk humbebly on the path of righteeousness, that we may avoid any sinful actions leading us towards destruction.
E yeu fuy apelat a lu, e aparelhegui a desliar le liament, e conseguida es tranquilitat e enayssi amermet de sas dolors.	"E tu fugiu do pecado, andaste em direção à luz, descobriste o caminho da libertaamoẽt, consegui a tranquilidade e finda as dôlors."
Mays empero ja corrupcio era confermada en le membre, per que no pogui refrenar aquela, e no cessec perambular la corrupcio en le membre entro que·l malaute peric.	However, the infection was already confirmed in his limb, so he could not restrain that and prevent the spread of infection within the body part where the painful ailment persisted.
E vi un autre metge le qual perforec un apostema cancros, e fo ulcerat aprop alscus dias, entro que foc magnificada la malicia de lu am lo senhor de lu.	A certain doctor infected with cancer performed an operation, and it became inflamed in the vicinity of his scrotum, during which time the illness of his Lordship worsened greatly.
La qual causa es quar le cranc caut es pur de humor melencolic, lahoras no cove que pervengua a lu am ferr de tot, sino que sia an membre le qual suffertes que de tot fos hostat.	The cause of this melancholablack mood is not that I've reached the end of all my affairs, but rather to be part of something where I feel completely disconnected from everything.
E per aquo, filhs, necessari es a vos que la operacio am ma sia devisada en dos devesios: so es en operacio a lu qual es associada salut, e en obra am la qual es perilh en las majors disposicios.	E per aquo, fillos, necessari hai que l'operació sigui divisada en dues vistes: ja és a l'operació que està associada a salut, i al treball amb la qual el risc es majoritatriament relacionat amb les disposicions més importants.
E yeu ja he exsitat aquo en tot loc de aquest libre en le qual venc opperacio en la qual es error e temor; per que necessari es a vos que guardetz aquo e layssetz aquel, per que les folhs no atrobo via a parlar e a vos desonestar.	You are hereby enjoined to refrain from making any errors or causing fear in this free place where you may operate; for which it is necessary that you observe what I have set out, so as not to undermine the right of others to speak and to dishonor you.
E donc prenetz las vostras armas am sollicitut e am proteccio de Dieu , e les vostres malautes am falicitat e am fermetat.	Then take your weapons into the sun and God's protection, and may your sick ones find health and be healed.
E usatz de la milhor via per la gracia de Dieu perdusent a salut e a lausabla successio, e laysatz las malautias terriblas de difficil sanacio, e ostatz las vostras armas de aquo que vos fa temer, per so que ysitatio en vostra fe e en le vostre nom no vos evasisca: quar mays es remanent a la vostra gloria, e pus aut en le mon e en derier a las vostras sanctitatz.	We beseech thee, O Lord of heaven and earth, to bestow upon us the better path through divine grace leading to salvation and blessed succession; alleviate our terrularly severe illnesses with difficult healing, and remove your waters that cause fear in you, so that by dwelling in your faith and calling on your name, we shall not be taken away from thee: for it is more fitting that we remain under your glory, both here on earth and ultimately unto your sanctity.
Gualia ja diyssec en alcunas sieuas monicios:	Gualia jà dissec en alcune sue moniciones:
“No mediquetz malautia mala, per so que mals metges no siatz nompnatz”.	"There are no bad illnesses or diseases; but there may be bad treatments that do not exist." (Note: This translation is a loose interpretation of the Gascon language phrase and might slightly vary based on context).

De cauteri am foc e am medicina aguda e rememoracio de la opperacio.	The surgery on the foot relates to acute medical conditions and memories of the operation.
Am aquel comensa le tractat de tot le libre.	A book starts the treatise on all of literature.
Cove que yeu digua la qualitat dels juvamentz de aquel cauteri e dels noccumentz de lu, e en qual compleccio sia prohibit cauteri.	I have reviewed the quality of that goldsmith's work and his pieces, as well as the restriction on their use in certain situations.
Donc dic que·l sermo de la qualitat del juvament de cauteri e del noccument de lu es sermo lonc e prolixs, e subtil per sciensa, e secret amaguat; e ja de lu a parlat gran multitut de savis, e de lu se son desacordatz, et a mi abasta un petit dels sermons de lor, temen perlonguacio.	I say that the language of the quality of youth's speech in cauterization and mourning is a long and prolix, subtle by science, and semi-secret; already many wise people have spoken much about it, but they disagree with each other, and for me, even a little bit of their sermons suffice due to prolonged exposition.
E donc dic que cauteri comfereys a tota compleccio universalment la qual es am materia o ses materia, exceptat dos compleccios, las quals son compleccios caudas ses materia .	Hence, it can be said that the concept of cause and effect is universally applicable to all matter or substances, with the exception of two cases which are exceptions due to their unique properties.
En la compleccio cauda e secca am materia se desecordero; quar alcus dyssero que cauteri es juvatiu ad aquela, e les autres dyssero le contrari de aquel, que cauteri no es convenient en malautia la qual es per qualiditat e per siccitat, quar natura del foc es qualiditat e siccitat, e enconvenient es que malautia cauda e secca am aquo que es caut e sec sia sanada.	In the case of dry and itchy skin condition; some doctors advise to use a lotion for this, while others say that cream is not advisebecause in illnesses characterized by dryness and dryness, water-based solutions are more suitable as nature of fire (creams) is drying out. It's not recommended to apply it on skin conditions where moisture needs to be restored.
E diysec aquel que ditz le contrari de aquel, que per cauteri es fayt juvament en tota malautia cauda e secca que ve en les cors dels homes, quar quan tu comparas le cors de home e las humiditatz de lu a la compleccio del foc, atrobas le cors de home freg.	B is the opposite of A that causes excessive sweating in all illnesses and results in dry tailing seen in men's bodies; when you compare the body of man to the moisture of it against the heat of the fire, you find the man's body burned.
E yeu dic per le sermo de aquel, que esperiment aquo ja a mi alscunas vetz a descubert.	The essence of this conversation is that we need to experiment with some methods already available in order to discover more. Let's explore and see what works best for us!
Mays empero no cove que vengua sobre aquo aquel que ja es exproat e excersitat en le capitol de cauteri per derier exercici, e a conogut la diversitat de la compleccio dels homes e la disposicio de las malautias en lor meteyssas, e las causas de aquelas, e·ls accidentz de lor, e l’espasi del temps de aquelas.	However, he does not cover the event that took place in the capital of Caudera during last year's exercise and known for its diversity of difficulties faced by people, their condition with illnesses and their causes, and incidents related to it, as well as the passage of time regarding these matters.
Mays en las autras compleccios, no es sobre vos temor, e majorment en las malautias fregas e humidas, quar ja totz les metges se son acordatz sobre aquels, e no so desecordatz en le juvament am cauteri en aquelas.	In Mays, and other times, it's not about your fear; mostly in the leaky and damp illnesses, as all stomachs are aware of those, and they do not forget when something burns during that time.
E sapiatz, filhs, que del secret de curacio per cauteri am foc e de la bontat de lu, so sobre cauteri am medicina comburent, es quar le foc es simple, la accio del qual no perven sino al membre le qual es cauterizat e no notz al autre membre am lu ajustat sino am petit nocument.	Children, I shall tell you the secret of curing with fire and medicine using heat, so be aware that in cauterization as a medical treatment, it is only simple heat applied to the member being cauterized, not affecting other parts touched by it unless causing slight discomfort.
Mays la accio de medicina comburent perven ad aquel en les membres le qual de lu alunhat, e fort leu fa venir en le membre malautia de dificil sanacio e fort leu ausit.	"May's medicine provides relief to those experiencuing limb discomfort and brings them significant ease in their afflicted body parts with a hard-to-achieve healing process."
Mays le foc, per la sua sublimitat e de la sua substancia bontat, no fa aquo sino que superfluisca E ja es a nos conogut per experiment e per longitut de servitut de studi am l’art sobre le veritat de las causas; e per aquo yeu so excusat de la longitut del sermo E si no fos que no es legut al mieu libre en aquest pausero a vos secret amaguat am le foc, e la qualitat de la operacio de lu en les cors e de la sieua expulcio per la qual expellis las malautias, am sermo philosophic demostratiu, le qual siria acuit en las vostras pessas.	The flame, for its sublimity and the goodness of its essence, does not do water but overflows; and it is well known to us by experiment and by the long tradition of study on the truth of causes; therefore I am excused from the length of this discourse. And if only that was not my free time in this idle pause for you (my secret friend), but also because of the quality of its action upon the bodies, and the entire expulsion of diseases which it removes through your speech, a demonstrative philosophical discourse.
E sapiatz, filhs, que els se desacordan del temps en le qual es convenient far cauteri e pausan le milhor temps de primaveyra.	Listen children, when to the best of your knowledge you disagree about the most suitable time for waxing and shaving in the springtime.
E yeu dic que cauteri es convenient en tot temps, per so que le nocument per le temps accident es submergit en le juvament de aquo que am le cauteri es atirat, e majorment si le cauteri es per dolors o de dolors necessaries, fortz e fistinas, las quals no suffertan tarditat per so que es temut de aquelas que vengua malicia, que es major que petit nocument entrant per lo temps.	I must say that a cauterization is generally advisannoble at all times; for the damage caused by accidental events can be overwhelmed in the heat of water when the cauterization has been applied, especially if it is to relieve severe and chronic pains or diseases which do not suffer from delay such that they bring more harm than small benefit during this time.
E aysso no catz en vostras pessas, o, filhs, aquo no estiman sino le poble vulguar e les fols metges, so es que ad aquela malautia que es sanada per cauteri no es redicio tot temps, e pausan aquel consequen.	Asso no cats in your pants, or children, only the common folk and simple cooks know that this illness is not always healed by plastering, and so they pause for that consequence.
E la causa no es ges ayssi quo els cuydan per aquo, quar cauteri no es sino en loc de medicina la qual altera la compleccio e esicca las humiditatz las quals son causa per que veno las dolors.	The cause is not as people think it to be; cauterization isn't a substitute for medicine, which alters the condition and dries out the moistures that are the cause of the pain.
Mays empero cauteri superflueys sobre la medicina per volicitat de la sua valitut e vertut de la sua operacio e grandesa del sieu senhor.	However, he performed unnecessary surgeries on the medicine due to his ambition for fame and glory of his work and grandeur of his master's position.
E es possible que la sua malautia retorne en alcuna hora del temps, segon la compleccio del malaute e la locacio de la sua malautia, e la vertut de lu, e aquo que es preparat en le cors de lu de la agreguacio de las superfluitatz en lu, e aquo que es pervengut a lu en la sua acquisicio en viandas e semblantz de aquelas causas; sino que la malautia en la qual sia aministrat cauteri sia malautia subtil en membre de paucas superfluitatz e humiditatz, ayssi cum cauteri de dent per dolor e semblantz ad aquel, possible es que en lu no retorne aquela dolor, mays aquo se fa en petitz.	E is also possible that his illness does not return at any time in the future, depending on the complexity of the sickness and the location of its occurrence, as well as the virtue of him, and what he has prepared in his body through the aggregation of superfluous humors, and what has been acquired by him through foods and appearances of those causes; but the illness for which cauterization was administerired is a subtle one affecting few excess humors and moisture, as with tooth-cauterization for pain and similarities thereto, it may be that this pain does not return in him, but rather what has been done at petitz.
E mays sermo vulgar es que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, e es sermo dreyturier, no ad aquo que els entendo en lu, quar els crezo que no es curacio que aprofieyta am medicina ni am autra causa aprop cauteri.	The common belief that cauterization is the last resort in medicine is not entirely accurate. While it may be considered as such in certain situations, its effectiveness varnishes with varying conditions and should not be regarded as an all-encompassing solution for every medical issue or condition. Cauterization involves using heat to burn tissue, often to stop bleeding, but the practice is more nuanced than that and requires professional judgment on a case by case basis.
E la causa es en contrari de aquo; e la entencio que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina no es sino quan administram las manieyras de curacio en alcunas malautias, e aquelas medicinas no conferieysso, e aprop en la fi de la causa aministra hom cauteri, e aprofieyta ad aquela.	The cause is in contrast to this fact; I understand that cauterization is the last resort of medicine and not just when administereing treatments for certain illnesses, but rather you apply it at the end of the treatment course if necessary, and you should use it accordingly.
E lahoras de aqui cat16 que cauteri es le derier remezi de medicina, no segon la entencio la qual entendo les vulgars e trops dels fols metges.	Here are the four basic steps commonly followed in medical cataract surgery (according to my understanding):
E diyssero les antics que cauteri am aur es milhor que cauteri am ferr, e no diyssero aquo sino per la equalitat del aur e sublimitat de la sua sustancia.	For three days they argued whether gold or iron was better and did not say anything because of the equality of the value of gold and the superiority of its substance.
E diyssero que le loc de cauteri no fa brac, cum aquo no sia absolutament vertat, quar yeu ja he aquo proat e he atrobat que aquel no fa aquo sino en alcus cors ses les autres, e cauteri am aquel es bo e milhor que am ferr ayssi quo els diyssero; mays empero quan tu fas cauteri am foc am de aur, no es a tu declarat, quar es egnit segon la quantitat que tu vols per la rugor de l’aur, e quar prepara a recebre freg; e si ajustas sobre lu ignicio se fon l’aur per le foc, e caso en le foc alcunas laminas per que le artifex catz per la occupacio de aquel.	Three days later they said that the place of burning does not work without water being completely wet, because I have already tasted and tested that it is not water but snow in other cases, and this burner works better than iron so as the others did say; however when you make a burner with gold foil, which has been declared by you, depends on the quantity you wish for the luster of the gold, and prepares to receive friction. And if it is adjusted over fire, then gold flakes are in that fire, and there may be some fragments for which the artisan can use them during handling.
E per aquo es fayt cauteri am ferr deves nos pus leugerament e pus propdanament a rectitut de operacio.	PER AQUO, the iron is made through careful and proper preparation to achieve better results in surgical operations.
E yeu ja he ordenat aquest capitol en le cauteri segon capitols, et he ordenat aquels del cap entro les pes, per so que aleugo le demandant aquo que vol de lu.	In the year of our Lord, I have decreed this chapter to be organized according to chapters, and those within sections should be arranged in such a way that it is easy for any seeker to find what they are looking for.
De cauteri de dolor de cap per frigiditat e humiditat.	The head massage for cold and dampness.
Le capitol primier.	First Edition Capitol Building
Aquesta cauterizacio confereys a la humiditat e frigiditat sobre le servel accident de la qual so doas causas, so es causa de soda e multitut de flux raumatic, apelat corissa, del cap a las partidas dels huelhs e de las aurelhas fluent, e multitut de dormir, e de dolor de dentz e del guolayro, e universalment de tota malautia que ve per fregiditat, ayssi cum paraliticament, sodo e apoplexio, e semblantz en aquelas malautias.	This incision provides moisture and coldness on the affected area due to which there are two main causes; one is its cooling effect and multitude of rheumatic flows from the head to the children's ears and temples, causing excessive sleepiness, dental pain and gum disease, as well as universally all illnesses that occur due to coldness, such as paralysis, sclerosis, apoplexy, and similar conditions in these diseasterrs.
La forma de aquesta cauterizacio es aquesta, que primieyrament comandes al malaute que sia evacuat am medicina lacsativa le cap mondificant, per tres o per quatre nueytz, segon que exhigeys la vertut del malaute e la edat de lu e la sua costuma.	The form of this cauterization is as follows, which initially commands the illness to be expelled through a purgative medicine that cleanses the bowels, for three or four nightps depending on the severity of the illness and age and habitual nature.
E aprop comanda li que raza le sieu cap am razor, e aprop fay aquel sezer entre las tuas mas sobre una banca cayrada e que pause las suas mas sobre le pietz sieu.	And command your dog to lie down on his back and then have him stay between my legs while I pet his belly with my hands.
E aprop pausa la razit de la tua palma aprop le pous sobre la razit del nas entre les huels sieus.	Place your palm against the surface of the nose, just below the nostrangs.
Mays empero, cum le tieu dit del mieg loc es pervengut, signa aquel loc am tenta, e aprop igneys le cauteri olivar del qual aquesta es la forma:	However, upon reaching the location you mentioned earlier, I attempted to approach that place and carefully ignited the small olive grove nearby which has this particular shape.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le loc senhat am tenta, a manieyra que descent, am la qual la tieua ma sia constrengida petit a petit, e tu revolveys aquel.	"That peaceful place you try to escape to, the method that descends upon you, and in which your mind is gently guided turn by turn."
E aprop leva la tua ma leugerament e reguarda le loc, e si veses ja del os esser descubert alcuna quantitat del cap, ayssi cum la quantitat de gra de errs, lahoras eleva la tua ma, e si no torno la tua ma am aquel ferr, am autre de aquel, si es enfrigidat, entro que sia vist del os aquo que yeu he dit a tu.	Gently take your hand and look at the lock, and if you see any part of the key exposed, just like the amount of gold in errors, lift up your hand again, and don't turn your hand on that iron or another one from that same metal piece, unless it is cold; enter only when you have seen what I told you.
E aprop pren un petit de sal e disolveys aquel sobre le loc e leyssa aquel per tres jorns.	A. Take a small pinch of salt and dissolve it in the water at that location, then leave it there for three days.
E aprop pausa sobre lu coto enbegut en boder e leyssa aquel sobre lu entro que sia destrusida la scara del foc.	In order to properly prepare the pastry crust, you will need to roll out the dough on a lightly floured surface and trim any excess that hangs over the edge of your pie tin or plate.
E aprop cura le loc am anguent tetrafarmacon entro que sia sanat.	A prop cure the location, which is anguished by four harmful substances (tetrapharmacum), shall be healed.
E ja diyssero que quant la plagua roman uberta, tant mielhs geta le brac, per que es milhor e mays juvatiu.	When the Roman Empire collapsed, agriculture improved and became more beneficial, as it was better organized.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia cauterizada la codena entro al os, e sia tengut le cauteri entro que sia adhurida alcuna partida de la specitut del os.	They would perform a surgical procedure to cut off the claw near the bone and put in place some caulking within that area of the bone, sealing it with a substance such as beeswax or pitch from the tree resin.
E aprop sia ras aquo que es adhust del os, e aprop sia curat.	A proper seal of both water and earth is appropriate to the situation, as well as being accurate.
E diyssero autres que am lo cauteri pervengua al derier, entro que enprema en le os forta enprecio entro que le os caga, e aquesta es la forma de alphecati petit:	Days two others arrived who brought the last cauldrons to arrive, within which first in great praise inside where the bones are contained. Capitol .xi.	"Capitol XI" is the eleventh studio album by American rock band America, released in October amo, 1975. The title of this album refers to its position as the tenth release by the group (counting their self-titled debut), but using Roman numerals instead of Arabic numbers for "XI" (eleven). However, there is no direct connection between the title and Capitol Records, the band's label at that time.

External hemorrhoid banding (also known as rubber band ligation) is a common procedure used to treat external hemorrhoids, which are swollen blood vessels located under the skin around the anus. During this outpatient procedure, a doctor inserts a small instrument into the anal canal and places a tight elastic band at the base of the hemorrhoid. This cuts off its blood supply, causing it to wither and fall off within a week or two.

Capitol .xxx.	The United States Capitol, often referred to simply as the Capitol, is a symbol of American democracy and history. Located in Washington D.C., it serves as the home of the U.amo Congress, which consists of the Senate and the House of Representatives. Constructed over many years with an iconic cast-iron dome crowning its center, this magnificent building represents not only the legislative branch of our government but also embodies the ideals upon which the United States was founded: unity, liberty, and justice for all.

This is a surgical method of delivering a baby through an incision made in the mother's abdomen and uterus.

Capitol .xxxvii.	The Roman numeral for the number 37 is written as "XXXVII". In this notation, X represents ten, V denotes five and I stands for one. Hence, combining these symbols accordingly gives us XXXVII (10 + 10 + 10 + 5 + 1 + 1 = 37).

Capitol .xxxix.	Capital XLIX in Roman numerals is the equivalent of the number 49. In English, it would simply be written as "forty-nine." The capitalization does not affect the translation since numbers do not change form based on their grammatabical role in a sentence; however, when using them within text that requires proper nouns to be capitalized (e.g., names of places or titles), you would still maintain those conventions as appropriate.

Capitol .xl.	The United States Capitol, often referred to as the Capitol building or simply "the Capitol," is a historic and iconic structure located in Washington D.C., serving as the home of the United States Congress - the legislative branch of the federal government consisting of the Senate and the House of Representatives. Construction began on September 18, 1793, under President George Washington's administration, with architect Dr. William Thornton designing it in a neoclassical style. The Capitol building stands as an emblem of American democracy and has been modified several times throughout history to accommodate the expanding legislature. Its iconic dome is one of its most recognizable features.

Capitol .xlix.	Chapter XLIX (49th) in English translates to "Chapter Forty-Nine" or simply "Capitol." Morphea (also known as localized scleroderma) is a rare autoimmune disease that affects the skin and sometimes underlying tissues, leading to discoloration and hardening of affected areas. Treatment for morphoea may involve topical medications, phototherapy or systemic therapies depending on the extent and severeity of the condition. Capitol .l.	In English, "Capitol" refers to the building where a legislature meets or to a similar structure in other countries that house governmental bodies for decision-making and governance. For example, it is commonly used in reference to the United States Capitol Building in Washington D.C., which houses both chambamoong of Congress: the Senate and the House of Representatives. The word can also be applied more broadly to any building or complex that serves as a center for political activity and government affairs.

Capitol .li.	Certainamo Capital de Liechtenstein (officially known as The Principality of Liechtenstein) is a small, doubly landlocked country in Central Europe surrounded by Austria and Switzerland. It has an area of just over 160 square kilometers and a population of approximately 38,000 people. Despite its diminutive size, Liechtenstein enjoys one of the highest GDP per capita levels in the world due to its prosperous financial services sector and favorable tax policies. It is also known for its beautiful landscapes, including mountains like Eschnerberg (Eschen Mountain) and Vorderer Grauspitz which offer stunning views and opportunities for outdoor recreation such as hiking and skiing. The nation's capital city of Vaduz serves as the seat of government, home to key institutions such as the parliament building known as Landtag, Liechtenstein Castle (the residence of the Prince), and various museums showcasing local history and culture.

Capitol .lii.	The English equivalent of "Capitole" in French is "Capitol." This word refers to a building where the legislative body meets, such as the United States Capitol or the Capitol Building housing the U.S. Congress. In some countries, it may also be used more broadly to refer to any seat of government or parliamentary assembly. The term originates from Latin "Capitolium," named after Jupiter'amoenus, and is connected with the Temple of Jupiter Capitolinus on Rome's Capitoline Hill.

It allows you to send letters or postcards up to a certain weight limit within your country for a standard flat rate price. This type of mail service usually does not include additional features such as tracking, insurance, or special handling. Capitol .v.	The word "Capitol" refers to the building where a legislative body meets and conducts its business, particularly in reference to the United States Congress located on Capitol Hill in Washington, D.C., which is often known simply as "the Capitol." There are also state capitols throughout the U.S. that house individual state's legislatures. The term can also be used more broadly to refer to any governmental building where lawmakers meet and governance takes place.

Capitol .vi.	Capital (or capitol) is the most important city or town in a country, state, or region. It often serves as the seat of government and administrative center for that area. In some cases, it may also be referred to as the national capital, while other countries have multiple capitals with different roles within their respective governments. The term "capital" is commonly used when discussing a country's primary city (e.eb. Washington D.C., Paris, or Tokyo), whereas "Capitol" usually refers to the building where the legislative body meets, such as the United States Capitol in Washington D.C.

Capitol .xix.	Chapter XIX (19) of the United States Constitution establishes the legislative branch, known as Congress, which consists of two chambebmbers - the Senate and the House of Representatives. The purpose of this bicameral system is to ensure a balance between states with large populations and those with smaller ones, while also maintaining checks and balances within the federal government.

Capitol .xxxix.	Capitalization is a fundamental aspect of English grammar that helps to convey meaning and importance within written text. Proper nouns, such as names of people, places, organizations, or events, are typically capitalized in English. Additionally, the first word of each sentence should always begin with a capital letter. Here are some key rules for using capitals:
De extraccio de sancguisugua annexsa al golayro.	Extraction of the attached guarana from the package.

Capitol .lii.	Capital, denoted by "Capitol" in some contexts or ".LII" as a country code top-level domain (ccTLD), is the city that serves as the seat of government for a state, region, or country and is typically where its legislature meets. In the United States, for example, Washington D.C. is the capital, housing all three branches of the federal government: the Executive Branch led by the President, the Legislative Branch composed of Congress (the Senate and the House of Representatives), and the Judicial Branch represented by the Supreme Court and other lower courts.

E la operacio en lu es que consideras lahoras si la eminencia de l’umbilic es per sanc de arceria, o de vena, o per ventositat; lahoras cove que sias prohibit de la curacio de lu, quar en aquela es temor e paor ayssi cum t’e ensenhat en le capitol en le qual he dit les apostemas per arceria e per vena. E si la eminencia del umbilic es per le budel o per la tela, lahoras cove que comandes al malaute que tengua le ale sieu, e sia stant extendut; e aprop senha am tenta en le circuit de tot le umbilic, e aprop comanda a lu que stia envers entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos, e aprop circunda am spatum lat en le circuit del umbilic sobre le loc le qual has senhat am la tenta; e aprop exten la maytat del apostema a las partidas desus am unci gran; e aprop lia en le circuit am fiel fort o am ceda e la manieyra del liar decent.	In the event of an umbilical hernia, it is advisable to consult with a healthcare professional for proper diagnosis and treatment options. If left untreated or if complications arise (such as strangulation or incarceration), surgery may be required to repair the hernia. The procedure involves making an incision at the base of the umbilicus, separating it from surrounding tissues, entering the abdominal cavity, and locating the protruding fatty tissue (omentum). The omentum is then carefully pushed back into place within the abdomen. If necessary, a herniated portion can be excised or reduced during surgery. In some cases, mesh reinforcement may be used to strengthen the weakened area and prevent recurrence of the hernia. It's crucial to follow post-operative care instructions from your healthcare provider for optimal healing and recovery.
E aprop huebre le mieg del apostema extendut sobre le liament e intromet le dit tieu en aquel indic e quereys le budel; e si tu l’as atrobat ni guardat per le liament, lahoras tu extratz alxorati e impelleys le budel a las partidas dedintz del ventre.	In case of an abdominal abscess extending over the region and involving your appendix, you should seek immediate medical attention as it may require surgical intervention; if you have previously felt or observed this symptom but did not pay attention to it, alert the doctor within a few hours and urge him/her to move towards exploratory laparotomy.

Ms. Lay is against your archery or vein, if so she circumvents that matter and returns to her workplace; then take two needles and insert them in those holes firmly and thread the circuit you made around the abscess in a cross shape, these which makes penetrate. If you wish to do so, remove the needles and inspect the wound where the flesh is stretched out and falls on its own; or pierce it when it becomes thinner and perforate, near the liquid that covers with poultices within which it should be healed.

If the ombelical hernia is not of great concern for infection or moisture, cover it with gauze as you have instructed and observe whether sanguineous drainage or moisture persists at that site; if so, apply appropriate measures to keep the area dry and consider using a hydrocolloid dressing.

Capitol .liv.	Capital One Arena, formerly known as Verizon Center and before that MCI Center and then the USAirways Arena, is an indoor arena located in Washington, D.C. It serves as the home court for the Washington Wizards (NBA) and the Washington Capitals (NHL). The venue also hosts concerts and other events throughout the year, attracting a wide audience from around the region and beyond. With its central location and modern facilities, Capital One Arena is one of the most prominent sports and entertainment destinations in the nation's capital.

In Latin America and parts of Europe, similar structures are often called Palacio Legislativo or Palais des Législatifs, which translamate as "Legislative Palace" in English.

Capitol .lviii.	In English, "capitulum" is a term used in botany to refer to the individual segments of an inflorescence or compound leaf. Each capitulum may contain multiple small flowers called florets. This structure is commonly seen in plants such as sunflowers and daisies.

Next, using a sterilized instrument like a clamp or ring device, securely fasten around the foreskin and tighten just enough so that no skin is pinched; if you are using a ring (Yale or Mogen clamp), ensure it's correctly placed on the inner side of the foreskin. The clamp should be held in place until the circumcision has healed, which typically takes about 7-10 days. During this time, keep the area clean and dry to promote proper healing and prevent any risk of infection. Remember that every child is different; consult a pediatrician or experienced medical professional if you're unsure or uncomired with performing circumcision. Capitol .lxx.	The House of Representatives is the lower chamber of Congress in the United States government, which meets at the United States Capitol building in Washington, D.C. It consists of representatives elected by the American people based on population from each state. The number of representatives per state varangs depending on its population size and ranges from one to fifty-three members across 435 districts nationwide. Each representative serves a two-year term. Together with the Senate, which is the upper chamber, they form the legislative branch responsible for making federal laws.

Hermaphroditism in humans occurs due to two mechanisms: one is the presence of ovaries within a male's scrotum (where it looks like an ovary, similar to a female's uterus). Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter LXXVI (Capital Letter L and Roman numeral for 76) is an English representation of the number 76, using a combination of uppercase letters from the Latin alphabet and Roman numerals. In this case, "L" represents 50 in Roman numerals and two additional "X"s represent each as 10, which adds up to 70 when combined with "L". The lowercase letter "xxvi" is a traditional way of writing 26 (with V representing 5 and I representing 1). Therefore, LXXVI equals 76.

E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes. E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua. E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza. E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	A: If the fracture is not properly aligned or if there are non-unionized, extended periods of suture along the seam, then healing may be impeded and the fracture may remain unhealed.

If it does not obey your command and extract the essence and elevate it, then insert a fine needle deep within that substance and extract from there, or use a ray of light and revolve around your mind in its entirety wherein it is placed.
E guarda te que no sia inscidida; quar si es trencada, es fayt a tu dificil elevar aquela mot e es vengut sobre le malaute per aquela nocument.	B) Take care that it is not severed; if it gets torn, you should try to carefully lift that part and place it back on the wound to alleamity your injury.
E cum aquela tota auras fora-gitada, lahoras pausa sobre le loc de la plagua lana submerssa en vi e oli rozat e oli no-rozat, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	C with that entire array of colors spread out, hours pause over the place of the drowned plane submerged in wine and oil, both roasted and not roasted, and cure within which is sanctified.
E si la vit es contrayta havent tortuositat a la qual sia envolucio a las partidas, e no es segon rectitut segon que havem dit, lahoras cove que tu fendas sobre aquela a tota partida de tortuositat de lu e als locs de envolucio de lu, e aprop suspen aquela am uncis entro que eleves aquela tota. Forma de unci orp:	Title: The Shape of Uncertainty: Embracing the Unknown in Life and Art
No es a lu accuitat ayssi cum als uncis ni es de aguda extremitat per so que no plague la vena; e es de grossa flexibilitat leon, quar si era subtil, inscidira la vena per la sua subtilitat; habantz es en lu superflua grosseza ayssi cum havem dit. De extraccio venae cruris.	Deep vein thrombosis (DVT) of the leg. In this procedure, blood is drawn from a vein in the lower extremity for diagnostic or treatment purposes.
Aquesta vena es engendrada en las cambas en terras caudas ayssi cum al- Ategi en terra de Arabics e en las terras de India caudas e aridas de pauca teneritat e en las quals no nays erba ni aybre. De sectione super vermes generatos sub cute et dicitur aegritudo bovina.	"This is from the section on worms generated under the skin and called cattle sickness."
Aquesta malautia es nompnada en alcuna terra deves nos malautia bovina per so quar motas veguadas endeve als bious e es verm pauc un le qual es nat entre la codena e la carn, e va en tot le cos pujan e devalan, e es mostrat al sentiment deves le sieu anament de membre en membre entro que disromp la codena e yeys fora. De extraccio de sagetas.	Extraction of essences or distillation.
Sagetas son diversificadas segon las specias, e segon les locs dels cors en les quals cazo, quar la lor diversitat es que de aquellas so que han grans puntas, e petitas, e concavas, e sordas, so es solidas; e de lor so que han tres angles, e de aquelas a las quals so que han lenguas; e de aquelas a las quals so astelas.	Sagittas of diverse types according to the species and locations where they are found, for their diversity is due to those that have large points, small points, concave bases, sour-shaped bodies; solid ones, on the one hand, and three-angled ones, and those with spikes.
E aquela que es segon les membres e las pessas en las quals cazo es segon dos manieyras: quar les membres o so membres principals concaus, ayssi cum le cervel, le cor, e·l fitge, e le pulmo, e les ronhos, e les budels, e la vezica, e a lor semblantz; e donc quan catz en alcu de aquestz membres e aparo a tu senhals de mort, la qual causa yeu recomtare aprop, lahoras cove que tu evites extraccio de aquela sageta en aquels quar la mort siec aquel en le qual en las majors disposicios, e quan a tu no appareysso aquestz mals senhals, e la sageta no es amaguada en la profunditat del membre, lahoras tu extratz aquela e cura la plagua.	From that which follows the members and parts in those cases where it is according to two manners: whether they be major principal limbs with them, as well as the brain, heart, liver, lungs, nose, intestines, kidneveis, and their appearances; and hence when pain arises from any of these members or appears to you in a manner resembling death signals, then I advise you at this time that you avoid external extraction from that cavity in those cases where the most likely cause is mortality in which there are major dispositions present, and when such signs do not appear externally on the limbs, and the cavity does not show any sign of deep-seated illness.
E dels senhals del servel es quan catz en lu sageta, e trespassa le os, e es yssit del cyphac le qual es sobre le cervel, quar accideys per lu soda vehement, e scotomia, e vertige, e rogor en les huels, e imflamacio e rogor de la lengua, e spasme e permixtio de entendament e vomi de colera, e fort leu es abscindida la paraula e es destruida la votz, e es yssit del loc de la plagua humiditat blanca semblant a pols, e yeys de lu semblant ad aquositat de la carn. Mays les senhals de la sageta quan catz en le cor, so que ela es prop de la mamila senestra, e sent am aquela quays sia ficada en causa dura, e no es causa vueda; e fort leu le movement de la sageta es semblant a movement del pols, e corr de la plagua sanc negra, e siec aquel fregiditat de las extremitatz, e suzor freja, e sincopi; e donc sapias que la mort descen ses tot dopte. E les senhals quan la sageta ha plaglat le pulmo so eyssiment de sanc spumos de la plagua, e les vayssels que so prop del col so apostematz, e es mudada la color del malaute, e expira sperit gran aut, e demanda atraccio de ayre freg. La qual causa es, quar en un home cazec sageta en le lacrimal del huel de lu en la razitz del nas, e yeu extrayssi aquela a lu del autra partida, dejos le grays de l’aurelha de lu, e es sanat, e no accidic en le huel de lu nocument.	The reason for this is that when an object gets caught in the lacrimal duct of your eye, it can obstruct tear flow from one side to the other, causing discomfort or pain. You should try to remove the foreign body gently with clean fingers and avoid touching the sensitive area near the ear canal (auricle). If you cannot remove the object yourself, seek medical help immediately. Leaving an object in your eye for too long may lead to further complications and potential damage.
E extrayssi autra sageta a un Juzeu la qual cazec en lu en lo grays del sieu huel, dejos la palpebra pus dejos, e la sageta ja era occultada e no so conseguit de aquela sino una petita extremitat am la qual adhereys al sieu fust, e era gran sageta de las sagetas agudas dels Turcs , am ferr leon en la qual no havia aurelhas. E senat es le Juzieu , e no accidic en le sieu huel mal accident.	The Senate is in session, and a tragedy has occurred at their headquarters.

E vi mays un home en le qual cazec una sageta en le dos de lu, e consolidada es la plagua sobre lu, e pus que foc aprop set ans, yssic la sageta en la razitz de la coyssa. E yeu fu appelat a la curacio de lu aprop le cazement de la sageta entro a tres dias.	You have been appointed as the curator of the city's archives within three days.

E did not have an accident in the place of importance where the sailboat had reached; and I continued to keep watch over it for several days without any incident; meanwhile, the repair was being completed, and after some days within which one day you felt something at your nose and told me about it.
E adonc yeu pausegui sobre la plagua medicina acuta corrosiva per motz dias entro que foc ubert, e am la tenta yeu assagegui aquel, e atrobegui la extremitat de la sageta subtil, la qual adhereys al fust.	So it turns out that you had a sudden acute medical condition involving an insect bite within the last few days, and I'm not sure if trying to touch or rub the affected area could be harmful. It seems that the skin in that area is sensitive, and something adheres to your limb.
E aprop yeu ajustegui en la apersio de la plagua per aquela medicina acuta entro que apparec a mi visiblament la extremitat de la sageta, e passec a mi temps am aquo per le spazi de temps entro quatre meses.	I apologize for the mistake in my prescription regarding that urgent medicine which you'll start to see improvements in your hand within weeks, and take time off work as needed during this period of four months.
E aprop pus que la plagua foc amplificada, e foc a mi possible entrometre las forfexs en lu, e remaure aquela, e no obezic ad eyssiment, lahoras yeu no cessegui subtiliar e ingeniar sobre aquela am manieyras de engen, entro que comensegui un dia sobre aquela am manieyras de engens pendre lu am forceps descentment faytas, segon que vindra la forma de aquelas en la fi del capitol, entro que extraxi aquela; e aprop restauregui aquela plagua. E si volem extraccio de mot sanc, scarificam am mota scarificacio; e si nos conoyssem que·l sanc es gros, lahoras cove que scarifiquem per scarificacio preonda.	In case we need to extract blood for testing, the skin should be punctured through a minor incision or scratching (scarification). E le terme de scarificacio en la qual es la profunditat de la codena tant solament.	The term "scarification depth" refers to the sole measurement of the depth of the layer itself.
E si aquel del qual la codena es grossa, dura, fusca, e les sieus pors so streytz, cove que les locs de las ventosas sian untatz lenitius, apertius resolutius; si es en temps d’estiu, ayssi cum es oli de aloen o oli de violat, o oli de amellas dossas, o oli de cemensa de coja; e si es en temps ivern, lahoras oli narci, o oli de liri, o oli de camamilla, o de sanc, e ad aquels semblantz. Mays si le ventozador es de amples pors de tendra carn, lahoras cove que sia prohibit de oli, e cove que ad aquest les locs de ventozas de lor aprop la ventozacio sian lavatz am ayguaros o am aygua freja de solatrum, o am aygua de coja, o am aygua de bordolaguas, e semblantz ad aquelas. Mays en ventosa que es aministrada en la malautia de plauressi, am aygua, en la qual no ha vergua transversa ni trauc, e no es aministrada sino que sia umplida de aygua, e es pausada sobre le membre tant solament. Capitol .xcvii.	In English, "Capitol" refers to the building where a legislative body meets. It is most commonly used in reference to the United States Capitol located in Washington D.C., which houses the U.S. Congress. The term can also be applied more broadly to similar buildings around the world that serve as meeting places for governmental or administrative bodies, such as state capitols in various US states where their respective legislatures convene.
Sanguissuguas no so administradas en motz membres sino en les membres en les quals non es possible posicio de ventosas, per la parvitat de aquels, ayssi cum le pot e gingiva e semblantz a lor; o en membre denudat de carn, ayssi cum le dit e·l nas e lors semblantz.	Leeches are not administeruted in joints or muscles, but rather in areas where it is impossible to place suckers, due to the small size of these organs and their similarity to lips and gingiva (gums), as well as those found on animals like frogs; alternatively, they may be applied to an area devoid of flesh, similar to the nose or other such locations.
E la qualitat de usar de aquelas que si has trobadas sanguisugas que so en las ayguas dossas de poyredura mundas.	The quality of using those that you have found leeches, which are in the fountains and ponds of poisoned wells.

Ayssi comensa lo prolec de la tersa partida: de restauracio.	Chapter Three: Restoration Techniques in Art Preservation

O, filh, sapiatz que jactan se de aquest capitol les fols metges e les vulguars e aquels que degun temps no reguardero les libres dels Antics ni legiro de aquels una letra. E per aquesta causa es fayt que aquesta manieyra dels scients in terra nostra es privat; e yeu no ho e obliat en aquo degun temps be de tot; e no he adhibit aquo que apres, sino per longitut de lectio dels libres dels Antics e studi sobre le entendement de aquels, entro que extrayssi la sciencia de aquels. Capitol primier.	First Edition Capital

Cove donc que diguam en le prohemi de aquest capitol las summas del sermo; e les capitols al entendament dels quals en le comensament es forsat le artifexs e a stacio sobre la veritat de aquels; so es vos e aquels que so promptz que sapian o aprenguan aquesta art nobla autres de vos.	Thus, I shall now present the summary of this chapter; and to the essence of which in the preceding chaputes are the sums of speeches; as well those capitols comprehendable by the understanding upon whose commencement it was foreshown the artifices and remain firm on truth's side of those: you, and those who are prompt or learn this noble art.
E donc dic que quan accideys a alcu fractura o dislocacio o torcio o cazement, lahoras cove que tu te coytes al comensament am fleubotomia o aleyar aquel, o quascu ensemps, si no prohibeys alcuna causa, ayssi cum debelitat de vertut, o es aquel al qual accideys effant, o viel en decrepitat, o es temps de vehement calor, o de vehement freg.	Therefore, when a limb is broken, dislocated, twisted or cemented, you should seek medical attention immediately, either through surgery or conservative treatment methods (such as casting), unless there are any contraindications to do so due to certain causes, such as severe weakness of the body, old age, extremely hot weather conditions, or extreme cold.
E aprop sia content en vianda sieua de erbas frejas e de carns de auzels e de crabotz; e prohibem carns grossas e umplir si de viandas e de tota vianda que umple las venas de sanc, entro que siras segurat de apostema caut, e si no temes efusio de materia al membre.	A proper diet in case of styes and eye boils consists mainly of leafy herbs and bird meats, such as chicken or turkey; prohibit fatty meats and fill oneself with vegetables and all other foods that do not strain the blood vessels, avoiding exudation from any part of the body.
E lahoras retorne le malaute al sieu regiment primier am le qual corr costuma de lu.	After three hours, the pain returned to his original regiment, which he usually lives with.
E donc cum le os trencat comensa esser restaurat, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia pascut de viandas nutritivas de nutriment mot e gros e greu en les quals sia viscositat, ayssi cum so viandas faytas de froment cueyt am aygua, e ris, e caps, e pes, e ventres de vacas, e huous, e peys fresc, e vi gros e semblants ad aquels, e am aquest regiment es fayta coagulacio de fractura pus leugierament e miels.	So the broken bone begins to be restored, at times when the pain is alleviated from consuming nutritious foods rich in protein and calories, such as bread made of wheat with water, cheese, rice, eggs, meat, fresh vegetables, fruits, and similar items, along with this kind of diet, there has been a notable improvement in bone healing.
E sapias que les osses trinquatz quan so en les homes que so en la primiera vilura e en los decrepitz, no es possible que sian continuatz e sian consolidatz segon lur natura per la exsiccacio dels membres de lor.	E sapient ones that the bones tremble when they are in men or in the primeval village, as well as in the elderly and decrepit individuals; it is not possible for them to be continuous and solidified according to their nature due to the dryness of their limbs.
E son consolidatz e continuatz segon lor natura tot temps per la exsiccacio de aquels membres, e so continuatz e consolidatz aquels que so de lor en la fi de la lenitat, ayssi cum les osses dels petitz effantz.	Bones are absorbed and continue according to their nature all the time for the desiccation of those members, and they also continue as those that belong to them at the end of the leniency period, just like the bones of little children.
Mays empero natura ajusta e amnecteys sobre le os trencat de tota partida alcuna causa semblant a glut en le qual es grossitut que adhereys e strenh aquel entro que so ensemps conglutinatz e liatz ensemps, entro que venen la fi de fortitut e de fermesa, ayssi cum foc al comensament, entro que denguna causa no prohibeys aquel de las suas obres.	Yet nature adjusts and amends all the broken pieces from every possible cause that resemble a glue with which to strengthen within ourselves those bonds we have formed together, just as fire brings warmth during meals, without any reason forbidding such actions in our works.
E per aquesta causa es necessari que pauses las viandas del malaute, viandas en las quals so gravitat e viscozitat e grosseza, ayssi cum havem dit.	For this reason, it is necessary for you to abstain from the foods of illness, such as those that are heavy and sticky and fatty, just as we have said.
Mota diversitat de fractura segon diversitat del membre.	Type of fracture according to the affected limb.
E sapias que las specias de fractura son diversas segon la diversitat dels membres, quar fractura del os de la camba es diversa de la fractura del os del cap; e la fractura del os del pietz es divers de la fractura del os del dos; e semblantment totz les autres membres son diverses entre lor.	The species of fractures are diverse according to the diversity of limbs, so a femur fracture is different from a skull fracture; and a foot bone fracture is different from a backbone fracture; similarly all other limbs have diverse types of fractures.
E yeu venc am rememoracio de tota specia de fractura, expausada en le sieu capitol distincta del autre.	As a result of every specific type of fracture, there is a unique healing process and timeline that can be distinguished from others. The treatment options and prognosis vary depending on the severity, location, and complexity of the fracture. Factors such as age, overall health, bone density, nutrition, and compliance with medical advice also play significant roles in determein the success of healing a broken bone.
Mota diversitat de fractura en si meteyssa.	Type of fracture in left mandible.
E son diversificadas las specias de fractura del os en lor meteyssas; quar es fayta fractura arcuada otra aquo que accidan en lu stellas; e alcunas veguadas es fayta fractura segon la longitut del os: e so las fracturas de lu satagia e astelhas e addicios procedentz e no-procedentz, ayssi cum es fayt en la pena quan es preparada a escriure, e es fractura am plagua e disrupcio en le cap, e es fractura fissura petita.	The types of bone fractures are diverse; some result from an arched break while others occur in stellate patterns; and certain variations appear according to the length of the bone. They can also be classified as fractures due to twisting, compression, or tension forces - both originating and non-originating ones, just like how it is described when preparing for writing a prescription. There are fractures that resemble splinters and disruptions in the joint area, and there are also tiny hairline fractures.
E a tota specia es engen o turment propri en restauracio de lu segon que vindra rememoracio de lu distincta en les sieus locs.	A complete change of scene is in order, otherwise there will be further distress during the restoration of your unique memories at their respective places.
Mota senhal de fractura del os.	Sign of bone fracture.
E per aquo es conoguda fractura del os: es tortuositat de lu, e de aquel eminencia e appericio de lu al sentiment, e so de lu quan compremes aquel am la tua ma.	An "E" in water is recognized as a bone break: the curvature of it, and that protrusion and glimmer seen when viewed from below, along with its resemblance to your mother's jawbone.
E donc quan no es en le loc tortuositat apparent ni so no es feyt deves le tieu tocament quan toques le os am agitacio e le malaute no atroba gran dolor, lahoras no es aqui fractura.	So, it does not appear that there is any obvious or serious issue when you touch your own area and if the bone movement causes discomfort but not great pain, then likely there isn't a fracture at this hour.
Habantz es possible que sia tortuositat o petita fissura, adon no cove que tu mauguas aquel am la tua ma e am compressio de tot; habantz pausa sobre lu de las medicinas de las quals ve rememoracio aprop aquel moment le qual conveneys al loc; e aprop sia streyt per strictura subtil.	It is possible that you have either tortuosity or small fissures, but do not worry as these may be the result of your body'amassing too much pressure from all over and compression; take pause on using any medications for which you remember experiencing discomfort at that moment when it was necessary; and try a more targeted approach for such subtle strictures.
E sapias que·l loc quan es arcuat e no es scindit en dos o otra aquo que no accidan en lu satagie, cum es remauguda tota partida de la sua compar, lahoras cove que comenses de la tua hora a rectificacio de lu habantz que a lu accida apostema caut.	E sapiens qui locus quantus est arcuatus et non scinditur in duo aut alio aquo, cum totum redactus est partes suae comparationis, cohaerebit hora qua commensuratur reparatio de illis habentibus cui accidat apostema caut.
E si a lu accida apostema caut, lahoras layssa aquel per alcus dias entro que cesse le apostema; e aprop engualha aquel segon quascuna manieyra que podes de levitat e de engen.	If you have an ear infection with pus discharge, leave it open for two days until the pus ceases; then proceed according to whichever method you can of elevation and ingenuity.

Capitol .iii.	In English, the word "capitol" (often written as "Capital") refers to the building where a legislative body meets. Specifically, it is used in reference to buildings that house the United States Congress or state legislatures. The term originates from Latin and its usage dates back to ancient Rome where it referred to structures built for religious purposes.

Capitol .v.	The word "capital" is the plural form of "capitol," which refers to a building in which a government meets and legislates, typically housing the legislative branch such as Congress or Parliament. The term "capitol" originated from the Capitoline Hill, one of the seven hills of Rome where temples for Juno, Jupiter, and Minerva stood.

Capitol .x.	Capital, capital letters or capitals are uppercase letters used to distinguish certain kinds of words and expressions in written English language. They can be found at the beginning of sentences, proper nounamoins (names of specific people, places, etc.), titles, acronyms, and numbers greater than one hundred (e.g., 100 but not "One Hundred"). Additionally, capitals are used for emphasis or stylistic purposes in some contexts. In LaTeX, capital letters can be represented by typing a regular uppercase letter without the use of any special commands.

Capitol .xiv.	Capitulum or Chapitre in French, signifies a section or division within a book, particularly one of the biblical canon. In Latin, 'caput' means head and '-ulum', a diminutive suffix, which together suggest a smaller part or chapter of something larger.

Capitol .xxvi.	The United States Capitol, located in Washington D.C., is the home of the U.S. Congress and the seat of the legislative branch of the federal government of the United States. Construction began in 1803 and was completed in its present form between 1851-1863 under architect Thomas U. Walter. The Capitol Building is an iconic symbol of American democracy, representing the enduring nature of the nation's legislative process and its commitment to serving the people through debate, compromise, and consensus-building.

E aquesta es la forma del torn:	El tornado es una columna de aire en rotación que se extiende desde el cielo hasta el suelo. Puede ser causada por fuertes tormentas y puede provocar daños significativos debido al viento destructivo, granizo e inundaciones. Los tornados pueden ocurrir en cualquier parte del mundo; sin embargo, son más frecuentes en los Estados Unidos, especialeste "Tornado Alley". Estos eventos climáticos extremos se miden y clasifican mediante la Escala Fujita de Tornados, que va desde la clase F0 (menor) a la clase F5 (grave). La preparación para un tornado incluye tener un plan familiar y acceso a una habitación segura o refugio.

E adonc si le membre retorna segon que volem, lahoras aministra regiment le qual ceda apostema caut e cura la plagua am aquo que conveneys a lu dels enguentz desiccatius.	Therefore, if the member is desired to return according to our will, it shall be administer groin which may result in an inflammation and treatment of the wound with water or any drying ointment that suits its condition.
E si dislocacio es am fractura e accideys en le os satagias separadas, lahoras tu perforsa le stement de lor, e fay en aquo so que havem dit en las malautias simplas de aquo que es precedit en les locz de aquels.	If the dislocation occurs as a result of falls or accidents in which the bones are separated, then it may lead to the loss of function thereof; and such injuries should be treated with care in cases where they have resulted from simple conditions that preceded them at those locations.
E guarda e esquiva segon la tua vertut aquel del intrament en las vias de temor segon que a tu es precedida la mia predicacio; quar aquo es milhor a tu deves le tieu Creator, e mays permanent a la tua gloria, e mays saludos al tieu cos verays aquels en le tieu temps.	As you watch and avoid the pitfalls that come with fear in these days following my preaching; for it is better for you to serve your Creator and thus secure lasting glory and true happiness in His eyes.
Ayssi fineysso las paraulas de Albucasim perfieytament de las quals Dieus ne sia benezeyt.	The correct Catalan translation for "Ay, Si Fineysse's oeuvres sont parfaitement en accord avec lesquelles Dieu n'était pas bienveillant." would be:
Amen.	Yes, amen is an expression used in English to affirm or agree with something that has been said. It is derived from the Hebrew word 'amen', which means faithfulness or reliability and it is commonly used at the end of prayers or statements as a form of assent or approval.
